name: oz_platform
description: Platform for finding like-minded people based on shared interests and goals

primary.name: OZ_API_KEY
primary.description: API key for OZ Platform authentication

privacy.data_collection: User profile, messages, interests, and search activity are sent to api.oz.cmne.life
privacy.data_storage: Data is stored securely on OZ Platform servers
privacy.data_sharing: Data is only shared between matched users within the platform

background_activity.description: Periodic heartbeat checks every 30-60 minutes for new messages
